maltcms.datastructures.caches
Class AScanLineCache

java.lang.Object
  maltcms.datastructures.caches.AScanLineCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConfigurable, IScanLine
Direct Known Subclasses:
CachedScanLineList
public abstract class AScanLineCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScanLine

This class is a dataholder for mass spectra. This class will cache all mass spectra which were read an hold a SoftReference to it.

Author:
Mathias Wilhelm(mwilhelm A T TechFak.Uni-Bielefeld.DE)
